control_descriptions.AC-2: Account Management - The organization manages information system accounts, including establishing, activating, modifying, reviewing, disabling, and removing accounts.
control_descriptions.AC-3: Access Enforcement - The system enforces approved authorizations for logical access to information and system resources.
control_descriptions.AC-4: Information Flow Enforcement - The system enforces approved authorizations for controlling the flow of information within the system and between connected systems.
control_descriptions.AC-6: Least Privilege - The principle that users and programs should have only the minimum privileges necessary to complete their tasks.
control_descriptions.AC-7: Unsuccessful Logon Attempts - The system enforces limits on consecutive invalid logon attempts by a user.
control_descriptions.AC-17: Remote Access - Establishes and manages remote access sessions.
control_descriptions.AC-18: Wireless Access - The organization establishes usage restrictions, configuration requirements, and implementation guidance for wireless access.
control_descriptions.AC-19: Access Control for Mobile Devices - The organization establishes usage restrictions, configuration requirements, and implementation guidance for mobile devices.
control_descriptions.AC-20: Use of External Information Systems - The organization establishes terms and conditions for external systems to process, store, or transmit organizational information.
control_descriptions.AU-2: Audit Events - The organization determines the types of events that the system will audit.
control_descriptions.AU-3: Content of Audit Records - The system generates audit records containing information that establishes what type of event occurred.
control_descriptions.AU-6: Audit Review, Analysis, and Reporting - The organization reviews and analyzes system audit records for indications of inappropriate activity.
control_descriptions.AU-8: Time Stamps - The system uses internal system clocks to generate time stamps for audit records.
control_descriptions.AU-9: Protection of Audit Information - The system protects audit information and audit tools from unauthorized access, modification, and deletion.
control_descriptions.AU-12: Audit Generation - The system provides audit record generation capability and generates audit records.
control_descriptions.CA-1: Security Assessment and Authorization Policies and Procedures - The organization develops policies and procedures for security assessment and authorization.
control_descriptions.CA-2: Security Assessments - The organization conducts security control assessments.
control_descriptions.CA-7: Continuous Monitoring - The organization develops a security assessment and authorization program.
control_descriptions.CA-8: Penetration Testing - The organization conducts penetration testing on systems or system components.
control_descriptions.CM-1: Configuration Management Policy and Procedures - The organization develops policies and procedures for configuration management.
control_descriptions.CM-2: Baseline Configuration - The organization develops and maintains baseline configurations for information systems.
control_descriptions.CM-3: Configuration Change Control - The organization manages and documents changes to the system.
control_descriptions.CM-6: Configuration Settings - The organization establishes and enforces security configuration settings.
control_descriptions.CM-7: Least Functionality - The organization configures systems to provide only essential capabilities.
control_descriptions.CM-8: Information System Component Inventory - The organization develops and maintains an inventory of system components.
control_descriptions.CP-2: Contingency Plan - The organization develops a contingency plan for the system.
control_descriptions.CP-7: Alternate Processing Site - The organization establishes an alternate processing site.
control_descriptions.CP-9: Information System Backup - The organization conducts backups of user-level and system-level information.
control_descriptions.CP-10: Information System Recovery and Reconstitution - The organization provides for recovery and reconstitution of the system to a known state.
control_descriptions.IA-2: Identification and Authentication (Organizational Users) - The information system uniquely identifies and authenticates organizational users.
control_descriptions.IA-3: Device Identification and Authentication - The system uniquely identifies and authenticates devices.
control_descriptions.IA-4: Identifier Management - The organization manages system identifiers.
control_descriptions.IA-5: Authenticator Management - The organization manages system authenticators (e.g., passwords, tokens, biometrics).
control_descriptions.IA-8: Identification and Authentication (Non-Organizational Users) - The system uniquely identifies and authenticates non-organizational users.
control_descriptions.IR-4: Incident Handling - The organization implements an incident handling capability.
control_descriptions.IR-5: Incident Monitoring - The organization tracks and documents information system security incidents.
control_descriptions.IR-6: Incident Reporting - The organization requires personnel to report suspected security incidents.
control_descriptions.IR-8: Incident Response Plan - Documents the organization's incident response processes and procedures.
control_descriptions.MP-2: Media Access - The organization restricts access to digital and non-digital media.
control_descriptions.MP-3: Media Marking - The organization marks system media.
control_descriptions.MP-4: Media Storage - The organization physically controls and securely stores media within controlled areas.
control_descriptions.MP-5: Media Transport - The organization protects and controls media during transport.
control_descriptions.MP-6: Media Sanitization - The organization sanitizes system media before disposal or release for reuse.
control_descriptions.PE-2: Physical Access Authorizations - The organization develops, approves, and maintains lists of individuals with authorized access to the facility.
control_descriptions.PE-3: Physical Access Control - The organization enforces physical access authorizations and controls entry to facilities.
control_descriptions.PL-1: Security Planning Policy and Procedures - The organization develops, documents, and disseminates security planning policy and procedures.
control_descriptions.PL-2: System Security Plan - The organization develops a security plan for the system.
control_descriptions.PM-2: Senior Information Security Officer - The organization appoints a senior information security officer.
control_descriptions.PM-9: Risk Management Strategy - The organization develops a comprehensive strategy to manage risk.
control_descriptions.RA-3: Risk Assessment - The organization conducts risk assessments.
control_descriptions.RA-5: Vulnerability Scanning - The organization scans for vulnerabilities in the system and applications.
control_descriptions.SA-3: System Development Life Cycle - The organization manages the system using a system development life cycle.
control_descriptions.SA-4: Acquisition Process - The organization includes security requirements in acquisition contracts.
control_descriptions.SA-5: Information System Documentation - The organization obtains documentation for the system.
control_descriptions.SA-9: External Information System Services - The organization requires service providers to comply with organizational security requirements.
control_descriptions.SA-11: Developer Security Testing and Evaluation - The organization requires developers to create a security assessment plan.
control_descriptions.SC-5: Denial of Service Protection - Protects against or limits the effects of DoS attacks.
control_descriptions.SC-7: Boundary Protection - The system monitors and controls communications at external boundaries and key internal boundaries.
control_descriptions.SC-8: Transmission Confidentiality and Integrity - The system protects the confidentiality and integrity of transmitted information.
control_descriptions.SC-10: Network Disconnect - The system terminates the network connection associated with a user session after a defined period of inactivity.
control_descriptions.SC-13: Cryptographic Protection - The system implements cryptographic mechanisms to protect information.
control_descriptions.SC-28: Protection of Information at Rest - The system protects the confidentiality and integrity of information at rest.
control_descriptions.SC-39: Process Isolation - The system maintains a separate execution domain for each executing process.
control_descriptions.SI-2: Flaw Remediation - The organization identifies, reports, and corrects system flaws.
control_descriptions.SI-3: Malicious Code Protection - The system implements malicious code protection mechanisms.
control_descriptions.SI-4: Information System Monitoring - The organization monitors the system to detect attacks and potential indicators of compromise.
control_descriptions.SI-5: Security Alerts, Advisories, and Directives - The organization receives security alerts and advisories and takes appropriate actions.
control_descriptions.SI-7: Software, Firmware, and Information Integrity - The system implements mechanisms to detect unauthorized changes.
control_descriptions.SI-10: Information Input Validation - The system checks the validity of information inputs.
control_descriptions.SI-13: Predictable Failure Prevention - The system provides alert capability for impending system component failures.
